attributes.action: Place a statue of Lucas Moura in Trafalgar Square for services to football
attributes.background:
I'm a life long Tottenham fan who has been through hell and back supporting my beautiful club. Last night Lucas Moura delivered all fellow Spurs fans worldwide into an orbit  of happiness of no return. 

His hat trick at the appropriately name Johan Cruyff Arena was nothing less than poetry.COYS
